identity.title: First appearance in array (with fixed start and end)

content.prompt: Complete the following method which takes the following parameters (in this order):- an array of integers arr,- an integer count,- an integer startingAt,- an integer stoppingAt,- and an integer key,the method has to return the index where the integer keyappears for the first time within the range delimited by positions startingAt and stoppingAt, but ONLY considering the count contiguous elements to the integer in the position startingAt. In case the integer key does not appear in the specified range of the array, the method must return -1. For example:indOfFirst( {1,2,3,4,5,6} , 3 , 1 , 2 , 3 ) => 2indOfFirst( {1,2,4,3,5,7} , 4 , 0 , 2 , 3 ) => -1indOfFirst( {3,2}, 1 , 0 , 0 , 3 ) => 0
